text:
Hey :wave:

Haven't seen anyone talking about new documentation design.
Just wanted to ask how you feel about it?
How is it to find information considering new structure and information architecture?

Since I'm still adjusting…
glad you got it fixed - the trick is to use the -g flag to install globally and not just locally (the current directory) (`npm install -g @hubSpot/cli@latest`)
Oh haven’t seen it. Thanks for sharing!

Hi! After data migration from US to EU, we got quite some issues for at least one customer for now.

The HubSpot api url is flipping for more than a day now between 2 IP’s for instance.
<https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/hubdb/tables/*******/rows?portalId=****&limit=12>
remote address 1: 104.18.243.108:443 (200 response)
remote address 2: 104.18.241.108:443 (488 response)

Any idea how to solve this? More experience with this issue?

The other issue is related to image urls, which are changed. See my comment in thread.

The other issue I’m facing is that images don’t load in content anymore. See image url below for example

Link US
https://******.<http://fs1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/*****/testtest.jpg|fs1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/*****/testtest.jpg>

Link EU
https://******.<http://fs1.HubSpotusercontent-eu1.net/hubfs/*****/testtest.jpg|fs1.HubSpotusercontent-eu1.net/hubfs/*****/testtest.jpg>

After migration links were changed from US to EU in filemanager, there was still a redirect to US. But files didn’t exist there anymore so i got loads of 404's.

Now it looks like the redirect is removed, however I can still not import images in content, all content is broken.

Is there any way to get the email of the deleted contact when the user tries to manually delete it from HubSpot? Actually, I configured the webhook with the event "contact.deletion" but in the payload, I am not getting the contact email.

Hello,
How can I fetch trough api the last phone call associated with a contact?
Is the association api retrieves the data based on date created desc?

<@UGDF9EBPW> this isn't something I ran into, when the first portal migrated from NA to EU, the website still had to be manually rebuilt. I did several that way a couple of years ago. This has always been the big concern and why there isn't an easy way to move a website from one portal to another, I feel like it's something the engineers should fix on their end though since they broke it :melting_face:
It was installed globally. Even uninstalled and reinstalled globally. Still wouldn't work until I adjusted my path manually

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.
Does anyone know if there is a folder inside a Theme, how to "Move" that folder out, or if there ways to permissioning a folder with a Group/Users on a DM folder?

Hey HubSpot Community,

I've noticed a large drop in our email performance starting in June 2024. We've had several large clients tell use that our SPF records and DNS keys are not matching up within our email headers, which is HubSpot's responsibility since our records point back to theirs. Has anyone else noticed serious deliverability issues? Another issue popped up this morning and we were advised that it's a email header issue which HubSpot tags while being delivered. It's frustrating because its 100% out of our control.

Any insight would be great appreciated!

Hi Everyone, new to the HubSpot Slack community and HubSpot development. I am posting as I am looking to develop an app for my company to launch our UI inside HubSpot and send data back to HubSpot quote line items based on interactions inside our UI. We are hoping this can be triggered off when particular products get added to the quote.

Through my research I found two possible paths to launch an Iframe action in a modal from the deal record. Developing a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/crm/ui-extensions/sdk?uuid=cf0c5520-c81f-45dd-8d3a-5d48619fdc78#open-an-iframe-in-a-modal|private app> or <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/crm/extensions/crm-cards#iframe-actions|public app>. Both are possible for us but, I am unsure what may be the best path to do what we need and if anyone has experience with integrating external software UI’s inside hub spot before.

Hey <@U06N68R8Z0Q> is this for programmable emails? Can I see a code snippet of how you try to pull the company data?

I have not pulled company data but I have product and custom object data, but it should work similar. The security above, I think it does not apply here as you are accessing it in an email not a page. I hope I am not wrong :slightly_smiling_face:
